divs: Sighting Details1.I was standing in my driveway smoking a cigar like i do on most nights. I always injoy looking up at the stars because i have seen multiple strange things in the sky of Bend Oregon since moving here 4 years ago. There was a news story on KOHD news in bend oregon and someone had video taped the first sighting i seen so i knew it just was not me.but in trying to look up the website so i could show you the video, it says the server is down... 2.I was watching a jet liner in the sky and noticed something flying behind it maybe 3 miles or so.. 3.I thought maybe it was a satellite. 4.It changed direction slightly heading north as the plane continued northwest. 5.Numb,excited cause that is the 4th time seeing something. 6.I watched it as far as my eyes would allow.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bend
There were no other sightings in Bend on or around June 11th 2011
Summary: Flying at what seemed as the same altitude behind a jet liner
